div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2350 Gerona, 1931 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 1087 AR Emporiae: 10 dr. (Amoros, Dracmes, Grp. VI-VII) Iberian: 19 den. (Cese) Roman Rep.: 1058 den. (to Sydenham 798, c. 68 B.C.) Disposition: unknown Information from L. Villaronga
